description: Returns summaries of the organization's resources.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization under which the resources exist.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Limit the resource search results based on the filter criteria. You can only use one filter per request. NamePrefix (string) --- Filters only resource that start with the entered name prefix . PrimaryEmailPrefix (string) --- Filters only resource with the provided primary email prefix. State (string) --- Filters only resource with the provided state.

nested_params.name: NamePrefix
nested_params.description: Filters only resource that start with the entered name prefix .

nested_params.name: PrimaryEmailPrefix
nested_params.description: Filters only resource with the provided primary email prefix.

nested_params.name: State
nested_params.description: Filters only resource with the provided state.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: One page of the organization's resource representation.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the resource: equipment or room.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the resource, which can be ENABLED, DISABLED, or DELETED.

nested_items.name: EnabledDate
nested_items.description: The date indicating when the resource was enabled for WorkMail use.

nested_items.name: DisabledDate
nested_items.description: The date indicating when the resource was disabled from WorkMail use.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token used to paginate through all the organization's resources. While results are still available, it has an associated value. When the last page is reached, the token is empty.
